moves.1. e4: I play this in hopes of King's Gambit (a personal blitz favorite).
moves.1... c5: ugh...I don't know but the first few moves...I was scared.
moves.2. Nf3 Nc6 3. d4 cxd4: Book, until I throw him for a loop.
moves.4. Bc4: Instead of retaking, I explode onto the offensive.
moves.4... e5 5. Ng5 Nh6 6. Qf3: f7 is now the object of my obsession.
moves.6... f6 7. Qh5+ Ke7: I thought he would play g6, but this suits me just fine!
moves.9. c3 Rg8: Okay, I'll remove the working piece!
moves.13. Bxg8 dxc3: I thought for a while upon seeing this move, before I played
moves.16... Qa6: I did not understand this move until I annotated it. He played this to save his Queen, but it cost him the game.
moves.17... Kb8 18. Qd6#: Oh, well. Good game, and thank you, deezy!
